entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Overcast. High plus 1.
